name: Sea Jurassic Craft
description:
Welcome to Jurassic sea craft where you can have different ocean dino species and sharks, mine resources, battle for dominance and create your own Jurassic underwater World.

Features:
-Free to play and easy to learn
-Exciting jurassic sea dinosaurs to unlock at every area
-Crossbreed between different sea creatures and create new hybrids
-Interact to make them work or level up to train them to work automatically
-Fight in underwater battle arena. Battle between mosasaurus and megalodon. See who wins!
